tool_description: Loads and customizes pre-designed templates for various social media content types with brand-specific modifications.

template_category.description: Template type: post, story, cover, banner, carousel, reel

design_theme.description: Visual theme: corporate, casual, elegant, playful, tech, fashion

primary_color.description: Hex color code for primary brand color

secondary_color.description: Hex color code for secondary brand color

logo_url.description: URL or path to brand logo file

error_messages: Invalid template category: Use one of [post, story, cover, banner, carousel, reel].
Unsupported design theme: Use one of [corporate, casual, elegant, playful, tech, fashion].
Invalid color format: Use valid hex color codes starting with # followed by 6 characters.
Logo file not accessible: Ensure the logo_url points to a valid image file.
usage: Select a template_category and design_theme, then customize with brand colors and logo. The tool returns a customizable template ready for content addition.

template_id.description: Unique identifier for the loaded template

template_url.description: URL or path to the customized template file

editable_elements.description: List of template elements that can be modified
